wiki.content: “Intro: Singularity” was released as the comeback trailer for BTS' LOVE YOURSELF 轉 'Tear' on May 7, 2018. Performed by V, the song is an R&B slow jam featuring languid bass and a hypnotizing melody. The lyrics focus on entering the dreamlike landscape of a lake during winter as a metaphor for the main protagonist lamenting a strained relationship (with himself or a third party). The word “singularity” has multiple interpretations, the most commonly adopted of which are either the state of being unique or alone in the universe (singular), or, in mathematics, a point at which “a function takes an infinite value”, usually with strange outcomes that warp the laws of physics and reality. As the eighth track of CD A in their second compilation album LOVE YOURSELF 結 'Answer'. The song also appears as the twelfth track on CD2 of BTS's first anthology album Proof. Was written and produced by RM and Charlie J. Perry. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
